subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray rallied to beat Rafael Nadal, 3-6, 6-2, 6-0, in the final of the Japan Open in Tokyo for his second consecutive title. Nadal had beaten Murray five straight times.
snippet: Andy Murray rallied to beat Rafael Nadal, 3-6, 6-2, 6-0, in the final of the Japan Open in Tokyo for his second consecutive title. Nadal had beaten Murray five straight times.
